title: Critical RCE in Apache Tomcat Default Installation
description: A critical remote code execution vulnerability exists in Apache Tomcat versions before 9.0.95 due to improper input validation in the JSP parser. An unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

title: SQL Injection in Microsoft SQL Server Authentication Module
description: A SQL injection vulnerability in Microsoft SQL Server 2019-2022 allows authenticated users to bypass authorization checks and execute arbitrary SQL commands with elevated privileges.

title: Memory Corruption in Linux Kernel USB Module
description: A heap buffer overflow vulnerability in the Linux kernel USB subsystem (versions 5.10-6.6) can be exploited by a local attacker to achieve privilege escalation and execute arbitrary code.

title: Privilege Escalation in OpenSSH
description: A vulnerability in OpenSSH 8.0-9.7 allows local users to escalate privileges to root by exploiting a logic error in the sshd process. Requires valid shell account.
internal_impact: High - Affects SSH access across infrastructure

title: Authentication Bypass in Cisco IOS XE
description: A critical vulnerability in Cisco IOS XE allows unauthenticated attackers to gain administrative access without credentials through the web management interface.
internal_impact: Critical - Affects all Cisco network devices

title: Zero-Day in Adobe Reader JavaScript Engine
description: A critical use-after-free vulnerability in Adobe Reader allows arbitrary code execution through maliciously crafted PDF documents.

title: Deserialization RCE in Java Spring Framework
description: A critical deserialization vulnerability in Spring Framework 6.0.0-6.0.12 and 5.3.0-5.3.31 allows remote code execution when untrusted data is deserialized.

title: Path Traversal in Nginx WebDAV Module
description: A path traversal vulnerability in Nginx WebDAV extension allows attackers to read arbitrary files from the filesystem with the privileges of the Nginx process.

title: Buffer Overflow in Windows DHCP Server
description: A remote code execution vulnerability in Windows DHCP Server component allows network-based attackers to execute arbitrary code without authentication.

title: Cross-Site Scripting in Atlassian Jira
description: A stored XSS vulnerability in Jira Server and Data Center allows authenticated users to inject malicious scripts that execute in the context of other users.

title: Weak Cryptography in OpenVPN Authentication
description: A cryptographic weakness in OpenVPN 2.4.0-2.6.8 allows attackers to forge authentication tokens and gain unauthorized access to VPN infrastructure.

title: Information Disclosure in AWS Lambda
description: A vulnerability in AWS Lambda environment variable handling exposes sensitive credentials in function logs and error messages.
affected_versions: All versions prior to January 2024 patch

title: LDAP Injection in Active Directory Federation Services
description: An LDAP injection vulnerability in ADFS allows attackers to bypass authentication and modify directory entries.

title: Integer Overflow in MySQL Query Processor
description: An integer overflow vulnerability in MySQL Server 8.0.0-8.0.35 allows authenticated users to cause denial of service or potentially execute arbitrary code.

title: Command Injection in Fortinet FortiGate SSL VPN
description: A command injection vulnerability in FortiGate SSL VPN portal allows unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary commands with administrative privileges.
internal_impact: Critical - Affects VPN and network security
